sentences.en: A minimal error or deviation may result in wide divergence.
Cities grew in the north of Britain where, previously , urbanization had been minimal.
sentences.cn: 在英国的北部,城市增加起以前那里曾经是城市化最低的地区.

sentences.en: Fortunately, the storm only did minimal damage to the farmer's crops.
sentences.cn: 很幸运, 暴风雨只使农民的庄稼受到轻微的损害.

sentences.en: I stayed with friends, so my expenses were minimal.
sentences.cn: 我住在朋友家, 所以我的花费很小.

sentences.en: In some operating systems, a minimal allocatable physical unit of storage.
sentences.cn: 在某些操作系统中, 可分配的最小物理存储单位.

sentences.en: It is not possible to know in advance which form will yield a minimal cost circuit.
sentences.cn: 我们不能预先知道哪种形式会得到最低成本的电路.

sentences.en: The co-operation between the two is minimal.
sentences.cn: 双方的合作是最低限度的。

sentences.en: The cost to taxpayers would be minimal.
sentences.cn: 纳税人的支出将是最少的。

sentences.en: The dismal English effort in the third Anglo - Dutch conflict of 1672 - 1674 requires minimal space here.
sentences.cn: 但是英国在1672 - 1674年第三次英荷战争中表现消沉,在此毋需赘述.

sentences.en: The likelihood of infection is minimal.
The minimal the art, the more maximum the explanation.
sentences.cn: 艺术无限少, 诠释无限多.

sentences.en: The money he'd been ordered to pay was minimal in relation to his salary.
sentences.cn: 他被要求支付的金额与他的薪水相比微不足道。

sentences.en: The storm caused only minimal damage.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨只造成了轻微破坏。

sentences.en: The storm did only minimal damage.
sentences.cn: 暴风雨只造成极轻微的损失.

sentences.en: Their ambitions are to bash out good grub with minimal fuss.
sentences.cn: 他们的目标就是尽可能省劲地大量供应可口饭菜。

sentences.en: They referred to this kind of art as minimal art.
sentences.cn: 他们把这种艺术叫微型艺术.

sentences.en: This is a practical course, with only a minimal amount of theory.
sentences.cn: 这是实践课程，只有少量理论。

sentences.en: Using short, easily recognized words facilitates navigation with minimal conscious reading.
sentences.cn: 采用短且易于识别的文字,才能让用户用最少的有意识阅读在界面中导航.

words.tran_cn: 最小化的；最小化；使达到最低限度的
最低限度地；最低程度地
量滴（液量最小单位）；极小的东西；二分音符
极简派艺术；最低纲领；极保守行动
极简抽象派艺术家；最低限要求者；最低纲领主义者
减到最小限度；估到最低额；轻视
最小值；最低限度；最小化；最小量
使减少；使缩到最小；极度轻视（minimize的过去分词形式）
使减到最少；小看，极度轻视

trans.tran_en: very small in degree or amount, especially the smallest degree or amount possible
